name: BabelFiche
short_description: Cross-programming-language object serialisation. The library uses a schema to write object networks to, and create object networks from, a file (eg XML). Written in Java with ports to C and C++ to follow. Features include file recovery and versioning.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: XML
